label: Address specific technical questions in PowerPoint slides
quote: The following questions must be addressed in the PowerPoint slides:
section: Factor 1 Technical Approach Volume I, Tab 2

label: Submit PowerPoint presentation via email with all other quote volumes by deadline
quote: The PowerPoint presentation shall be submitted via email with all other quote volumes on or before 7/31/2025 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time and shall then be presented orally.
section: Factor 1 Technical Approach Volume I, Tab 2
short_label: Submit PowerPoint with quote by deadline

label: Do not include price or cost in Technical Volume
quote: This volume must not contain any reference to price or cost; however, resource information ... may be contained in the technical quotation so that the Contractor's understanding of the requirements may be evaluated.
section: Factor 1 Technical Approach Volume I, Tab 2

label: Present information to facilitate Government’s evaluation of Factor 1 and describe quality achievement
quote: The Quoter shall present information, either in it’s oral presentation or PowerPoint information to facilitate the Government’s evaluation of Factor 1. The Quoter shall provide information describing how it shall achieve quality results in performing under the intended Task Order.
section: Factor 1 Technical Approach Volume I, Tab 2
short_label: Present info for Factor 1 and quality

label: Present information to facilitate Government’s evaluation of Factor 2 and address bulleted items
quote: The Quoter shall present information, either in it’s oral presentation or PowerPoint information to facilitate the Government’s evaluation of Factor 2 and address the bulleted items below:
short_label: Present info for Factor 2 and bulleted items

label: Demonstrate understanding of management and business approaches to SOW requirements
quote: The Offeror shall demonstrate its understanding of the management and business approaches to coordinate, perform, integrate, control, and accomplish the SOW requirements.

label: Provide management plan addressing specified areas
quote: The Offeror shall provide a management plan that addresses, at a minimum, the following areas:
short_label: Provide management plan for specified areas

label: Proposed management structure including clear lines of authority and communications
quote: Proposed management structure, including clear lines of authority and communications to perform the requirements of the SOW.

label: Description and diagram of structural connections or associations of responsible entities
quote: Description and diagram of the structural connections or associations of the entities responsible for this work with any corporate or division organizations

label: Proposed subcontracting arrangements and management approach
quote: Proposed subcontracting arrangements, if any, and the effectiveness of the proposed approach for managing these arrangements to assure that the Government receives services conforming to contract requirements.

label: Approach to performing requirements of the SOW
quote: Approach to performing the requirements of the SOW

label: Identification of management risk areas and recommended mitigation approaches
quote: Identification of management risk areas and recommended approaches to minimize the probability and impact of those risks.

label: Oral presentation shall not contain any price information
quote: The oral presentation shall not contain any price information.
short_label: No price info in oral presentation

label: Video or audio recording of oral presentations by quoters is strictly prohibited
quote: Video or audio recording of oral presentations by quoters is strictly prohibited.

label: By participating in the oral presentation, the Quoter acknowledges full compliance with all solicitation terms and conditions
quote: By participating in the oral presentation, the Quoter acknowledges that it is in full compliance with all solicitation terms and conditions, in accordance with applicable laws and statutes.

label: Web links to the Quoter specific web-based conference platform shall not be shared with anyone other than the authorized Government participants
quote: Web links to the Quoter specific web-based conference platform shall not be shared with anyone other than the authorized Government participants
short_label: Do not share web links except with authorized Govt

label: Limit oral presentation participants to no more than five, including Key Personnel and one prime company representative.
quote: No more than five (5) total Quoter participants shall attend the oral presentation. If the above guidance results in more than 5 participants, at a minimum, the Key Personnel and one prime company representative is required.
short_label: Limit oral presentation participants to five

label: Provide Contract Specialist with names, employer/company, and email addresses of oral presentation participants at least 48 hours prior.
quote: Quoters shall provide the Contract Specialist with the name, employer/company, and e-mail addresses of the Quoter’s participants for the oral presentation no later than 48 hours prior to the scheduled Oral Presentation.

label: Oral presentations are limited to 45 minutes, exclusive of clarification period.
quote: Oral presentations are limited to 45 minutes in duration, exclusive of any needed Clarification period.

label: Government will not evaluate slide deck information not presented during the 45-minute time limit.
quote: The Government will not evaluate any of the information in the slide deck that is not presented during the Quoter’s 45-minute time limit.

label: Quoter shall not volunteer information that might be construed as changing its quote during oral presentation.
quote: The Quoter shall not volunteer any information that might be construed as changing its quote.
section: Rules of Engagement for Oral Presentations
short_label: Do not volunteer info that changes quote

label: Quoter shall not utilize any computers, tablets, smart phones, or separate conference lines/phones, except those required to host the web-based conference platform, during oral presentation.
quote: The Quoter shall not utilize any computers (other than the ones required to host the web-based conference platform being utilized for the oral presentation), tablets, smart phones, or separate conference lines/phones, while conducting the oral presentation, and shall not bring or distribute any written or electronic materials during the oral presentation.
section: Rules of Engagement for Oral Presentations
short_label: No extra devices/materials during oral presentation

label: Quoter participants shall not reach back to any other personnel or persons for assistance during oral presentation.
quote: The Quoter participants shall not reach back, by phone/conference bridge, e-mail or any other means, to any other personnel or persons for assistance during the oral presentation.
section: Rules of Engagement for Oral Presentations
short_label: No outside assistance during oral presentation

label: Submit Power Point Slides for Oral Presentation
quote: The Quoter shall submit the Power Point Slides for the Oral Presentation to the Contract Specialist with the proposal.
short_label: Submit PowerPoint slides for oral presentation

label: Submit pricing information using provided Pricing Schedule
quote: The pricing information shall be submitted using the Pricing Schedule provided in the solicitation.
